FIRST COME LOVE

NOW COME MARRIAGE
Come celebrate with us as we tie the knot, as we stand together with sweaty hands & open hearts extending our friendship to include the vows of marriage. Festivities will begin with dinner, dancing, and happily-ever-afters to follow.

GERRARD

LEANDRO

The minute I heard my first love story. I started looking for you, not knowin how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along. I love you, not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you, not only for what you have made of yourself but for what you are making of me. .....

DIANNE

ANNA

When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible. I would rather share one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone. You have made a place in my heart where I thought there was no room for anything else. .....

WHERE AND WHEN

OF THE MARRIAGE
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam rhoncus, leo at pretium commodo, dui ipsum tristique dolor, in ullamcorper tellus velit quis nisl. In placerat volutpat elit quis dictum. Ut id sem nec mauris lacinia rhoncus.
DATE & LOCATION

It will be held on Saturday October 30,2010 at Manalia Tower, Anfix Street ST01. Check the map to get the direction.

TIME

It will start at Five O'Clock in the evenings. Dinner + dancing to follow. Costumes & creative attire highly encouraged.

ACCOMODATION

We have arranged accommodations at a nearby Comfort Inn for guests who are making a bit of a trip.
